category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GoToStructExpandWaitPeriod
preference.preference_description: Specifies the number of seconds to wait for the complete load of a structure (when the "Go To Object" operation is invoked from Trace Report), before highlighting the selected line. If the structure is not fully loaded after this time interval and the line is not loaded, then it cannot and will not be highlighted.
